mapper.sql: select h.no as hotelNo, h.name as hotelName, h.city_no as cityNo, count(*) as count, sum(total_price) as profit, sum(total_person) as totalPerson, to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy') as year, to_char(sysdate,'MM') as month
select h.no as hotelNo, h.name as hotelName, h.city_no as cityNo, count(*) as count, sum(total_price) as profit, sum(total_person) as totalPerson, to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy') as year, #{month} as month
select bh.total_price as total_price, total_person, hotel_no from booking_history bh
mapper.select: from hotel h, ( where bh.hotel_no in (select no from hotel h where h.owner_no=#{no}) and trunc(bh.start_date, 'MM') = trunc(sysdate, 'MM')) u where u.hotel_no = h.no

select h.no as hotelNo, h.city_no as cityNo, h.name as hotelName, c.year, c.month, sum(c.count) as count, sum(c.profit) as profit, sum(c.total_person) as totalPerson from chart c join hotel h on c.hotel_no=h.no where c.owner_no=#{no} and c.month=#{month} group by h.no, h.city_no, h.name, c.year, c.month order by hotelName, month
select month, sum(count) as count, sum(profit) as profit, sum(total_person) as totalPerson from chart where owner_no=#{no} group by month
select month, count(*) as count, sum(profit) as profit, sum(total_person) as totalPerson from chart group by month
